author: ianna
body:
The following changes are introduced in the new xml files under Run2 directories:
- Run2/cms.xml: introducing new constants, changing TrackBeamZ2:

```
diff Geometry/CMSCommonData/data/cms.xml Geometry/CMSCommonData/data/Run2/.
17c17
<       <Constant name="TrackBeamZ2" value="2.935*m"/>

---
>       <Constant name="TrackBeamZ2" value="2.932*m"/>
19a20
>       <Constant name="TrackBeamR3" value="7.7633*cm"/>
23a25,36
>       <!--Pixel patch pannel sandwiched layers: total thickness-->
>       <Constant name="PIXSandwichLayerThick" value="[PIXSandwichLayer1Thick]+[PIXSandwichLayer2Thick]+[PIXSandwichLayer3Thick]+[PIXSandwichLayer4Thick]"/>
>       <Constant name="PIXSandwichLayer1Thick" value="0.2*mm"/>
>       <Constant name="PIXSandwichLayer2Thick" value="11.0*mm"/>
>       <Constant name="PIXSandwichLayer3Thick" value="0.5*mm"/>
>       <Constant name="PIXSandwichLayer4Thick" value="0.3*mm"/>
>       <!--Pixel patch pannel sandwiched layers-->
>       <Constant name="PIXNoseRin"  value="215*mm"/>
>       <Constant name="PIXNoseRout" value="[PIXNoseRin]+[PIXSandwichLayerThick]"/>
>       <Constant name="PIXSandwichLayerRout2" value="1063*mm"/>
>       <!--Pixel nose length-->
>       <Constant name="PIXNoseLength" value="619.5*mm"/>

```
- Run2/caloBase.xml - volume CALO changes to make space for the nose: 

```
diff -wb Geometry/CMSCommonData/data/caloBase.xml Geometry/CMSCommonData/data/Run2/.
10,11c10,12
<           <ZSection z="-[cms:CalorBeamZ1]" rMin="[cms:CalorBeamR1]" rMax="[cms:CalorMuonR]"/>
<           <ZSection z="-[cms:TrackBeamZ2]" rMin="[cms:TrackBeamR2]" rMax="[cms:CalorMuonR]"/>

---
>       <ZSection z="-[cms:TrackBeamZ2]-[cms:PIXNoseLength]" rMin="[cms:TrackBeamR3]" rMax="[cms:CalorMuonR]"/>
>       <ZSection z="-[cms:TrackBeamZ2]-[cms:PIXNoseLength]" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[cms:CalorMuonR]"/>
>       <ZSection z="-[cms:TrackBeamZ2]" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[cms:CalorMuonR]"/>
14,15c15,17
<           <ZSection z="[cms:TrackBeamZ2]" rMin="[cms:TrackBeamR2]" rMax="[cms:CalorMuonR]"/>
<           <ZSection z="[cms:CalorBeamZ1]" rMin="[cms:CalorBeamR1]" rMax="[cms:CalorMuonR]"/>

---
>       <ZSection z="[cms:TrackBeamZ2]" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[cms:CalorMuonR]"/>
>       <ZSection z="[cms:TrackBeamZ2]+[cms:PIXNoseLength]" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[cms:CalorMuonR]"/>
>       <ZSection z="[cms:TrackBeamZ2]+[cms:PIXNoseLength]" rMin="[cms:TrackBeamR3]" rMax="[cms:CalorMuonR]"/>
```
- Run2/materials.xml - new materials used in the nose description plus correct T_Kapton definition:

```
diff Geometry/CMSCommonData/data/materials.xml  Geometry/CMSCommonData/data/Run2/.
3932,3933c3932,3933
<   <CompositeMaterial name="T_Kapton" density="1.4*g/cm3" symbol=" " method="mixture by weight">
<    <MaterialFraction fraction="0.59985105">

---
>   <CompositeMaterial name="T_Kapton" density="1.42*g/cm3" symbol=" " method="mixture by weight">
>    <MaterialFraction fraction="0.691099">
3936c3936
<    <MaterialFraction fraction="0.080541353">

---
>    <MaterialFraction fraction="0.026178">
3939c3939,3942
<    <MaterialFraction fraction="0.31960759">

---
>    <MaterialFraction fraction="0.073298">
>     <rMaterial name="materials:Nitrogen"/>
>    </MaterialFraction>
>    <MaterialFraction fraction="0.209425">
4571a4575,4596
>   <CompositeMaterial name="T_G10" density="1.9*g/cm3" symbol=" " method="mixture by weight">
>     <MaterialFraction fraction="0.13232243">
>       <rMaterial name="materials:Carbon"/>
>     </MaterialFraction>
>     <MaterialFraction fraction="0.032572448">
>       <rMaterial name="materials:Hydrogen"/>
>     </MaterialFraction>
>     <MaterialFraction fraction="0.48316123">
>       <rMaterial name="materials:Oxygen"/>
>     </MaterialFraction>
>     <MaterialFraction fraction="0.35194389">
>       <rMaterial name="materials:Silicon"/>
>     </MaterialFraction>
>   </CompositeMaterial>
>   <CompositeMaterial name="Tpatch_PN" density="2.35*g/cm3" symbol=" " method="mixture by weight">
>     <MaterialFraction fraction="0.47">
>       <rMaterial name="materials:Inconel600"/>
>     </MaterialFraction>
>     <MaterialFraction fraction="0.53">
>       <rMaterial name="materials:T_Kapton"/>
>     </MaterialFraction>
>   </CompositeMaterial>
```
- Run2/eregalgo.xml - both ECAL and its child EREG volumes change according to the CALO mother volume 

```
diff Geometry/EcalCommonData/data/Run2/eregalgo.xml Geometry/EcalCommonData/data/eregalgo.xml
9,13c9,13
<           <ZSection z="-[eecon:EEFarZC]"  rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EErNeck]"/>
<           <ZSection z="-[eecon:EEzNeckC]" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EErNeck]"/>
<           <ZSection z="-[eecon:EEzNeckC]" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EBRMax]"/>
<           <ZSection z="-[eecon:EEzFront]" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EBRMax]"/>
<           <ZSection z="-([escon:PRESH_Z_OFFSET] - [escon:PRESH_Z_TOTAL]/2. + [eecon:EEzMagF])" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EBRMax]"/>

---

16,20c16,20

<           <ZSection z=" [eecon:EEzFront]" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EBRMax]"/>
<           <ZSection z=" [eecon:EEzNeckC]" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EBRMax]"/>
<           <ZSection z=" [eecon:EEzNeckC]" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EErNeck]"/>
<           <ZSection z=" [eecon:EEFarZC]"  rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EErNeck]"/>

---
>           <ZSection z="  [escon:PRESH_Z_OFFSET] - [escon:PRESH_Z_TOTAL]/2. + [eecon:EEzMagF]"  rMin="[eecon:EEIRECR]" rMax="[eecon:EBRMax]"/>
>           <ZSection z=" [eecon:EEzFront]" rMin="[eecon:EEIRECR]" rMax="[eecon:EBRMax]"/>
>           <ZSection z=" [eecon:EEzNeckC]" rMin="[eecon:EEIRECR]" rMax="[eecon:EBRMax]"/>
>           <ZSection z=" [eecon:EEzNeckC]" rMin="[eecon:EEIRECR]" rMax="[eecon:EErNeck]"/>
>           <ZSection z=" [eecon:EEFarZC]"  rMin="[eecon:EEIRECR]" rMax="[eecon:EErNeck]"/>
23,32c23,32
<           <ZSection z="[escon:PRESH_Z_OFFSET] - [escon:PRESH_Z_TOTAL]/2." rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[escon:PRESH_RMAX_FRONT]"/>
<           <ZSection z="[escon:PRESH_Z_OFFSET] + [escon:PRESH_MID_Z]"      rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[escon:PRESH_RMAX_BACK]"/>
<           <ZSection z="[escon:PRESH_Z_OFFSET] + [escon:PRESH_Z_TOTAL]/2." rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[escon:PRESH_RMAX_BACK]"/>
<           <ZSection z="[eecon:EEzFront]" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[escon:PRESH_RMAX_BACK]"/>
<           <ZSection z="[eecon:EEzFront]" rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EErMax1]"/>
<           <ZSection z="[eecon:EEzBack]"  rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EErMax2]"/>
<           <ZSection z="[eecon:EEzBack]"  rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EBRMax]"/>
<           <ZSection z="[eecon:EEzNeck]"  rMin="[cms:PIXNoseRout]" rMax="[eecon:EBRMax]"/>

---

- Run2/trackermaterial.xml - new material added:

```
diff Geometry/TrackerCommonData/data/Run2/trackermaterial.xml Geometry/TrackerCommonData/data/trackermaterial.xml
136,143d135
<     <CompositeMaterial name="Tpatch_PN" density="2.35*g/cm3" symbol=" " method="mixture by weight">
<       <MaterialFraction fraction="0.47">

<       </MaterialFraction>
<       <MaterialFraction fraction="0.53">

-  'Geometry/TrackerCommonData/data/Run2/trackerpatchpannel.xml' and 'Geometry/TrackerCommonData/data/Run2/trackerpixelnose.xml' - actual nose description
